casebody.data:
ANIMAL CARE CLINIC, INC., d/b/a Horizon Ridge Animal Hospital, a Nevada Corporation, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Rob Bare, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Michaela Gama, Individually; and Nancy Robbin Smith, Individually, Real Parties in Interest. No. 76445 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 24, 2019

Deny.
